common.empty_description: Sorry, we could not find any results

register_page.heading: Create an account
register_page.name: Full name
register_page.name_rule: Only letters and the dot (.) character, followed by a space, are allowed.
register_page.password_rule_1: Password must be at least 6 characters.
register_page.password_rule_2: Password must have at least one special character.
register_page.terms_rule: You must accept the terms and conditions.
register_page.email_desc: Email must be a valid email address.
register_page.password_desc: Password must be at least 6 characters and must have at least one special character.
register_page.success_desc: Please continue to verify your account.
register_page.fail_2_desc: We will resolve this issue as soon as possible.
register_page.otp_rule: The verification code must be 6 characters long.
register_page.verify_success_desc: Please log in to your account.
register_page.verify_fail_2_desc: We will resolve this issue as soon as possible.
register_page.resend_otp_success_desc: Please enter the new code to verify your account.
register_page.resend_otp_first_line: One Time Password (OTP) has been sent via Email to:
register_page.resend_otp_second_line: Enter the OTP below to verify it

login_page.heading: Sign in to your account
login_page.email_desc: Email must be a valid email address.
login_page.password_desc: Password must be at least 6 characters and must have at least one special character.
login_page.sign_in_fail_2_desc: We will resolve this issue as soon as possible.

forgot_password_page.heading: Forgot your password?
forgot_password_page.description: Enter your email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
forgot_password_page.email_desc: Your email must be registered with us before.
forgot_password_page.email_rule: Your email must be valid and registered with us before.
forgot_password_page.back: Back to Kindle Hope Candles Console
forgot_password_page.fail_2: Fail to send reset password email
forgot_password_page.fail_2_desc: We will resolve this issue as soon as possible.

reset_password_page.heading: Change your password
reset_password_page.description: Enter a new password below to change your password.
reset_password_page.new_password_desc: Password must be at least 6 characters and must have at least one special character.
reset_password_page.confirm_password_desc: Confirm password must be exactly the same as the new password.
reset_password_page.password_rule_1: Password must be at least 6 characters.
reset_password_page.password_rule_2: Password must have at least one special character.
reset_password_page.success_desc: Please log in to your account to continue shopping.
reset_password_page.fail_2_desc: We will resolve this issue as soon as possible.

account_profile_page.description: You can update your personal information, change your password, or confirm that you want to receive emails about future promotional programs.
account_profile_page.email_desc: You cannot change your registered email.
account_profile_page.name: Full name
account_profile_page.name_rule: Only letters and the dot (.) character, followed by a space, are allowed.
account_profile_page.current_password_desc: Fill in your current password if you want to change it.
account_profile_page.password_rule: Password must be at least 6 characters and must have at least one special character.
account_profile_page.new_password_desc: Fill in your new password if you want to apply it.
account_profile_page.both_passwords_required: Both current password and new password are required if you want to update.
account_profile_page.receive_offers: Sign up for our promotional emails
account_profile_page.receive_offers_desc: We will send you emails about future promotions.
account_profile_page.customer_data_privacy_desc: The personal data you provide is used to answer queries, process orders or allow access to specific information. You have the right to modify and delete all the personal information found in the “My Profile” page.
account_profile_page.terms: I agree to the terms and conditions and the privacy policy
account_profile_page.terms_desc: You must accept the terms and conditions and the privacy policy before submitting.
account_profile_page.success_desc: Please log in to your account to continue shopping.
account_profile_page.fail_1_desc: Please change at least one field before submitting.
account_profile_page.fail_2_desc: Please check your account information and try again.
account_profile_page.fail_3_desc: We will resolve this issue as soon as possible.

account_addresses_page.heading: Your adresses
account_addresses_page.delete_fail_1_desc: Please check your account information and try again.
account_addresses_page.delete_fail_2_desc: We will resolve this issue as soon as possible.

add_address_page.heading: New address
add_address_page.description: You just need to fill in fields which has an asterisk (*). The rest are optional.
add_address_page.name: Full name
add_address_page.name_rule: Only letters and the dot (.) character, followed by a space, are allowed.
add_address_page.address_desc: The address includes the house number, street, district.
add_address_page.success_desc: Now you can choose this address as one of your shipping address.
add_address_page.fail_1_desc: Please try to add address again.
add_address_page.fail_2_desc: We will resolve this issue as soon as possible.
add_address_page.email_desc: Email must be a valid email address.

update_address_page.heading: Update address
update_address_page.no_changes_desc: Please change at least one field before submitting.
update_address_page.success_desc: Now you can choose this address as one of your shipping address.
update_address_page.fail_1_desc: Please try to update address again.

testimonials.heading: All That Kind Words
testimonials.testimonial_1: The scent is refreshing and sweet, but not too overwhelming, and it reminds me of strolling on the beaches of Hawaii, i.e. heaven. I also love the cute, millennial-pink color...
testimonials.testimonial_2: The scent is refreshing and sweet, but not too overwhelming, and it reminds me of strolling on the beaches of Hawaii, i.e. heaven. I also love the cute, millennial-pink color...

footer.subscribe_rule: Please enter a valid email address.

product_card.go_to_product: Go to product page for more details

cart.secure_payment_desc: We accept Credit Cards, Momo, VNPay, ZaloPay, ... and Bank Transfers are also available
cart.fast_delivery_desc: Receive your order at home. In a hurry, we also offer Express Home Delivery
cart.free_returns_desc: You can exchange or return your order within 30 days. And we can collect it from your home or work address
cart.packaging_desc: Contemporary and eco-friendly wrapping with high quality materials
